amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-179 to clarify that health care services as defined in H.R. 1215 include safety, professional, and administrative services directly related to health care.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-179 to clarify that health care services as defined in H.R. 1215 include safety, professional, and administrative services directly related to health care.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
